name: Rel.mem_interedges_iff
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s : Finset Œ±
t : Finset Œ≤
x : Prod Œ± Œ≤
‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (Rel.interedges r s t) x) (And (Membership.mem s x.1) (And (Membership.mem t x.2) (r x.1 x.2)))
decl:
theorem mem_interedges_iff {x : Œ± √ó Œ≤} : x ‚àà interedges r s t ‚Üî x.1 ‚àà s ‚àß x.2 ‚àà t ‚àß r x.1 x.2 := by
  rw [interedges, mem_filter, Finset.mem_product, and_assoc]

name: Rel.mk_mem_interedges_iff
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s : Finset Œ±
t : Finset Œ≤
a : Œ±
b : Œ≤
‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (Rel.interedges r s t) { fst := a, snd := b }) (And (Membership.mem s a) (And (Membership.mem t b) (r a b)))
decl:
theorem mk_mem_interedges_iff : (a, b) ‚àà interedges r s t ‚Üî a ‚àà s ‚àß b ‚àà t ‚àß r a b :=
  mem_interedges_iff

initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r EmptyCollection.emptyCollection t) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
@[simp]
theorem interedges_empty_left (t : Finset Œ≤) : interedges r ‚àÖ t = ‚àÖ := by

name: Rel.interedges_mono
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop

ht : HasSubset.Subset t‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÅ
‚ä¢ HasSubset.Subset (Rel.interedges r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ) (Rel.interedges r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ)
decl:
theorem interedges_mono (hs : s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ) (ht : t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ) : interedges r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ interedges r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ :=
  fun x ‚Ü¶ by
    simp_rw [mem_interedges_iff]
    exact fun h ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®hs h.1, ht h.2.1, h.2.2‚ü©

name: Rel.card_interedges_add_card_interedges_compl
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s : Finset Œ±
t : Finset Œ≤
‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (Rel.interedges r s t).card (Rel.interedges (fun x y => Not (r x y)) s t).card) (HMul.hMul s.card t.card)
decl:
theorem card_interedges_add_card_interedges_compl (s : Finset Œ±) (t : Finset Œ≤) :
    #(interedges r s t) + #(interedges (fun x y ‚Ü¶ ¬¨r x y) s t) = #s * #t := by
  classical
  rw [‚Üê card_product, interedges, interedges, ‚Üê card_union_of_disjoint, filter_union_filter_neg_eq]
  exact disjoint_filter.2 fun _ _ ‚Ü¶ Classical.not_not.2

name: Rel.interedges_disjoint_left
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s s' : Finset Œ±
hs : Disjoint s s'
t : Finset Œ≤
‚ä¢ Disjoint (Rel.interedges r s t) (Rel.interedges r s' t)
decl:
theorem interedges_disjoint_left {s s' : Finset Œ±} (hs : Disjoint s s') (t : Finset Œ≤) :
    Disjoint (interedges r s t) (interedges r s' t) := by
  rw [Finset.disjoint_left] at hs ‚ä¢
  intro _ hx hy
  rw [mem_interedges_iff] at hx hy
  exact hs hx.1 hy.1

Œ≤ : Type u_5

‚ä¢ Disjoint (Rel.interedges r s t) (Rel.interedges r s t')
decl:
theorem interedges_disjoint_right (s : Finset Œ±) {t t' : Finset Œ≤} (ht : Disjoint t t') :
    Disjoint (interedges r s t) (interedges r s t') := by
  rw [Finset.disjoint_left] at ht ‚ä¢
  intro _ hx hy
  rw [mem_interedges_iff] at hx hy
  exact ht hx.2.1 hy.2.1

‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r s t) (s.biUnion fun x => Finset.map { toFun := fun x_1 => { fst := x, snd := x_1 }, inj' := ‚ãØ } (Finset.filter (fun y => r x y) t))
decl:
lemma interedges_eq_biUnion :
    interedges r s t = s.biUnion fun x ‚Ü¶ {y ‚àà t | r x y}.map ‚ü®(x, ¬∑), Prod.mk.inj_left x‚ü© := by
  ext ‚ü®x, y‚ü©; simp [mem_interedges_iff]

name: Rel.interedges_biUnion_left
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop

‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r (s.biUnion f) t) (s.biUnion fun a => Rel.interedges r (f a) t)
decl:
theorem interedges_biUnion_left (s : Finset Œπ) (t : Finset Œ≤) (f : Œπ ‚Üí Finset Œ±) :
    interedges r (s.biUnion f) t = s.biUnion fun a ‚Ü¶ interedges r (f a) t := by
  ext
  simp only [mem_biUnion, mem_interedges_iff, exists_and_right, ‚Üê and_assoc]

name: Rel.interedges_biUnion_right
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù¬≤ : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
inst‚úù¬π : DecidableEq Œ±
inst‚úù : DecidableEq Œ≤
s : Finset Œ±
t : Finset Œπ
f : Œπ ‚Üí Finset Œ≤
‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r s (t.biUnion f)) (t.biUnion fun b => Rel.interedges r s (f b))
decl:
theorem interedges_biUnion_right (s : Finset Œ±) (t : Finset Œπ) (f : Œπ ‚Üí Finset Œ≤) :
    interedges r s (t.biUnion f) = t.biUnion fun b ‚Ü¶ interedges r s (f b) := by
  ext a
  simp only [mem_interedges_iff, mem_biUnion]
  exact ‚ü®fun ‚ü®x‚ÇÅ, ‚ü®x‚ÇÇ, x‚ÇÉ, x‚ÇÑ‚ü©, x‚ÇÖ‚ü© ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®x‚ÇÇ, x‚ÇÉ, x‚ÇÅ, x‚ÇÑ, x‚ÇÖ‚ü©,
    fun ‚ü®x‚ÇÇ, x‚ÇÉ, x‚ÇÅ, x‚ÇÑ, x‚ÇÖ‚ü© ‚Ü¶ ‚ü®x‚ÇÅ, ‚ü®x‚ÇÇ, x‚ÇÉ, x‚ÇÑ‚ü©, x‚ÇÖ‚ü©‚ü©

name: Rel.interedges_biUnion
initialProofState:
Œπ : Type u_2
Œ∫ : Type u_3
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù¬≤ : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
inst‚úù¬π : DecidableEq Œ±
inst‚úù : DecidableEq Œ≤
s : Finset Œπ
t : Finset Œ∫
f : Œπ ‚Üí Finset Œ±
g : Œ∫ ‚Üí Finset Œ≤
‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r (s.biUnion f) (t.biUnion g)) ((SProd.sprod s t).biUnion fun ab => Rel.interedges r (f ab.1) (g ab.2))
decl:
theorem interedges_biUnion (s : Finset Œπ) (t : Finset Œ∫) (f : Œπ ‚Üí Finset Œ±) (g : Œ∫ ‚Üí Finset Œ≤) :
    interedges r (s.biUnion f) (t.biUnion g) =
      (s √óÀ¢ t).biUnion fun ab ‚Ü¶ interedges r (f ab.1) (g ab.2) := by
  simp_rw [product_biUnion, interedges_biUnion_left, interedges_biUnion_right]

initialProofState:

theorem card_interedges_le_mul (s : Finset Œ±) (t : Finset Œ≤) :
    #(interedges r s t) ‚â§ #s * #t :=
  (card_filter_le _ _).trans (card_product _ _).le

Œ≤ : Type u_5

‚ä¢ LE.le 0 (Rel.edgeDensity r s t)
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_nonneg (s : Finset Œ±) (t : Finset Œ≤) : 0 ‚â§ edgeDensity r s t := by
  apply div_nonneg <;> exact mod_cast Nat.zero_le _

name: Rel.edgeDensity_le_one
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop

‚ä¢ LE.le (Rel.edgeDensity r s t) 1
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_le_one (s : Finset Œ±) (t : Finset Œ≤) : edgeDensity r s t ‚â§ 1 := by
  apply div_le_one_of_le‚ÇÄ
  ¬∑ exact mod_cast card_interedges_le_mul r s t
  ¬∑ exact mod_cast Nat.zero_le _

name: Rel.edgeDensity_add_edgeDensity_compl
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop

‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (Rel.edgeDensity r s t) (Rel.edgeDensity (fun x y => Not (r x y)) s t)) 1
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_add_edgeDensity_compl (hs : s.Nonempty) (ht : t.Nonempty) :
    edgeDensity r s t + edgeDensity (fun x y ‚Ü¶ ¬¨r x y) s t = 1 := by
  rw [edgeDensity, edgeDensity, div_add_div_same, div_eq_one_iff_eq]
  ¬∑ exact mod_cast card_interedges_add_card_interedges_compl r s t
  ¬∑ exact mod_cast (mul_pos hs.card_pos ht.card_pos).ne'

name: Rel.card_interedges_finpartition_left
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù¬π : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s : Finset Œ±
inst‚úù : DecidableEq Œ±
P : Finpartition s
t : Finset Œ≤
‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r s t).card (P.parts.sum fun a => (Rel.interedges r a t).card)
decl:
theorem card_interedges_finpartition_left [DecidableEq Œ±] (P : Finpartition s) (t : Finset Œ≤) :
    #(interedges r s t) = ‚àë a ‚àà P.parts, #(interedges r a t) := by
  classical
  simp_rw [‚Üê P.biUnion_parts, interedges_biUnion_left, id]
  rw [card_biUnion]
  exact fun x hx y hy h ‚Ü¶ interedges_disjoint_left r (P.disjoint hx hy h) _

initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop

s : Finset Œ±

decl:
theorem card_interedges_finpartition_right [DecidableEq Œ≤] (s : Finset Œ±) (P : Finpartition t) :
    #(interedges r s t) = ‚àë b ‚àà P.parts, #(interedges r s b) := by
  classical
  simp_rw [‚Üê P.biUnion_parts, interedges_biUnion_right, id]
  rw [card_biUnion]
  exact fun x hx y hy h ‚Ü¶ interedges_disjoint_right r _ (P.disjoint hx hy h)

name: Rel.card_interedges_finpartition
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop

inst‚úù : DecidableEq Œ≤
P : Finpartition s
Q : Finpartition t
‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r s t).card ((SProd.sprod P.parts Q.parts).sum fun ab => (Rel.interedges r ab.1 ab.2).card)
decl:
theorem card_interedges_finpartition [DecidableEq Œ±] [DecidableEq Œ≤] (P : Finpartition s)
    (Q : Finpartition t) :
    #(interedges r s t) = ‚àë ab ‚àà P.parts √óÀ¢ Q.parts, #(interedges r ab.1 ab.2) := by
  rw [card_interedges_finpartition_left _ P, sum_product]
  congr; ext
  rw [card_interedges_finpartition_right]

name: Rel.mul_edgeDensity_le_edgeDensity
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s‚ÇÅ s‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ±
t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ≤
hs : HasSubset.Subset s‚ÇÇ s‚ÇÅ
ht : HasSubset.Subset t‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÅ
hs‚ÇÇ : s‚ÇÇ.Nonempty
ht‚ÇÇ : t‚ÇÇ.Nonempty
‚ä¢ LE.le (HMul.hMul (HMul.hMul (HDiv.hDiv ‚Üës‚ÇÇ.card ‚Üës‚ÇÅ.card) (HDiv.hDiv ‚Üët‚ÇÇ.card ‚Üët‚ÇÅ.card)) (Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ)) (Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ)
decl:
theorem mul_edgeDensity_le_edgeDensity (hs : s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ) (ht : t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ) (hs‚ÇÇ : s‚ÇÇ.Nonempty)
    (ht‚ÇÇ : t‚ÇÇ.Nonempty) :
    (#s‚ÇÇ : ‚Ñö) / #s‚ÇÅ * (#t‚ÇÇ / #t‚ÇÅ) * edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ ‚â§ edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ := by
  have hst : (#s‚ÇÇ : ‚Ñö) * #t‚ÇÇ ‚â† 0 := by simp [hs‚ÇÇ.ne_empty, ht‚ÇÇ.ne_empty]
  rw [edgeDensity, edgeDensity, div_mul_div_comm, mul_comm, div_mul_div_cancel‚ÇÄ hst]
  gcongr
  exact interedges_mono hs ht

name: Rel.edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s‚ÇÅ s‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ±
t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ≤
hs : HasSubset.Subset s‚ÇÇ s‚ÇÅ
ht : HasSubset.Subset t‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÅ
hs‚ÇÇ : s‚ÇÇ.Nonempty
ht‚ÇÇ : t‚ÇÇ.Nonempty
‚ä¢ LE.le (HSub.hSub (Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ) (Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ)) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul (HDiv.hDiv ‚Üës‚ÇÇ.card ‚Üës‚ÇÅ.card) (HDiv.hDiv ‚Üët‚ÇÇ.card ‚Üët‚ÇÅ.card)))
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul (hs : s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ) (ht : t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ) (hs‚ÇÇ : s‚ÇÇ.Nonempty)
    (ht‚ÇÇ : t‚ÇÇ.Nonempty) :
    edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ - edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ ‚â§ 1 - #s‚ÇÇ / #s‚ÇÅ * (#t‚ÇÇ / #t‚ÇÅ) := by
  refine (sub_le_sub_left (mul_edgeDensity_le_edgeDensity r hs ht hs‚ÇÇ ht‚ÇÇ) _).trans ?_
  refine le_trans ?_ (mul_le_of_le_one_right ?_ (edgeDensity_le_one r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ))
  ¬∑ rw [sub_mul, one_mul]
  refine sub_nonneg_of_le (mul_le_one‚ÇÄ ?_ ?_ ?_)
  ¬∑ exact div_le_one_of_le‚ÇÄ ((@Nat.cast_le ‚Ñö).2 (card_le_card hs)) (Nat.cast_nonneg _)
  ¬∑ apply div_nonneg <;> exact mod_cast Nat.zero_le _
  ¬∑ exact div_le_one_of_le‚ÇÄ ((@Nat.cast_le ‚Ñö).2 (card_le_card ht)) (Nat.cast_nonneg _)

name: Rel.abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s‚ÇÅ s‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ±
t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ≤
hs : HasSubset.Subset s‚ÇÇ s‚ÇÅ
ht : HasSubset.Subset t‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÅ
hs‚ÇÇ : s‚ÇÇ.Nonempty
ht‚ÇÇ : t‚ÇÇ.Nonempty
‚ä¢ LE.le (abs (HSub.hSub (Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ) (Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ))) (HSub.hSub 1 (HMul.hMul (HDiv.hDiv ‚Üës‚ÇÇ.card ‚Üës‚ÇÅ.card) (HDiv.hDiv ‚Üët‚ÇÇ.card ‚Üët‚ÇÅ.card)))
decl:
theorem abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul (hs : s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ) (ht : t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ)
    (hs‚ÇÇ : s‚ÇÇ.Nonempty) (ht‚ÇÇ : t‚ÇÇ.Nonempty) :
    |edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ - edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ| ‚â§ 1 - #s‚ÇÇ / #s‚ÇÅ * (#t‚ÇÇ / #t‚ÇÅ) := by
  refine abs_sub_le_iff.2 ‚ü®edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul r hs ht hs‚ÇÇ ht‚ÇÇ, ?_‚ü©
  rw [‚Üê add_sub_cancel_right (edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ) (edgeDensity (fun x y ‚Ü¶ ¬¨r x y) s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ),
    ‚Üê add_sub_cancel_right (edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ) (edgeDensity (fun x y ‚Ü¶ ¬¨r x y) s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ),
    edgeDensity_add_edgeDensity_compl _ (hs‚ÇÇ.mono hs) (ht‚ÇÇ.mono ht),
    edgeDensity_add_edgeDensity_compl _ hs‚ÇÇ ht‚ÇÇ, sub_sub_sub_cancel_left]
  exact edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul _ hs ht hs‚ÇÇ ht‚ÇÇ

name: Rel.abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_two_mul_sub_sq
initialProofState:
ùïú : Type u_1
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
inst‚úù¬π : LinearOrderedField ùïú
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s‚ÇÅ s‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ±
t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ≤
Œ¥ : ùïú
hs : HasSubset.Subset s‚ÇÇ s‚ÇÅ
ht : HasSubset.Subset t‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÅ
hŒ¥‚ÇÄ : LE.le 0 Œ¥
hŒ¥‚ÇÅ : LT.lt Œ¥ 1
hs‚ÇÇ : LE.le (HMul.hMul (HSub.hSub 1 Œ¥) ‚Üës‚ÇÅ.card) ‚Üës‚ÇÇ.card
ht‚ÇÇ : LE.le (HMul.hMul (HSub.hSub 1 Œ¥) ‚Üët‚ÇÅ.card) ‚Üët‚ÇÇ.card
‚ä¢ LE.le (abs (HSub.hSub ‚Üë(Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ) ‚Üë(Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ))) (HSub.hSub (HMul.hMul 2 Œ¥) (HPow.hPow Œ¥ 2))
decl:
theorem abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_two_mul_sub_sq (hs : s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ) (ht : t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ)
    (hŒ¥‚ÇÄ : 0 ‚â§ Œ¥) (hŒ¥‚ÇÅ : Œ¥ < 1) (hs‚ÇÇ : (1 - Œ¥) * #s‚ÇÅ ‚â§ #s‚ÇÇ)
    (ht‚ÇÇ : (1 - Œ¥) * #t‚ÇÅ ‚â§ #t‚ÇÇ) :
    |(edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ : ùïú) - edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ| ‚â§ 2 * Œ¥ - Œ¥ ^ 2 := by
  have hŒ¥' : 0 ‚â§ 2 * Œ¥ - Œ¥ ^ 2 := by
    rw [sub_nonneg, sq]
    gcongr
    exact hŒ¥‚ÇÅ.le.trans (by norm_num)
  rw [‚Üê sub_pos] at hŒ¥‚ÇÅ
  obtain rfl | hs‚ÇÇ' := s‚ÇÇ.eq_empty_or_nonempty
  ¬∑ rw [Finset.card_empty, Nat.cast_zero] at hs‚ÇÇ
    simpa [edgeDensity, (nonpos_of_mul_nonpos_right hs‚ÇÇ hŒ¥‚ÇÅ).antisymm (Nat.cast_nonneg _)] using hŒ¥'
  obtain rfl | ht‚ÇÇ' := t‚ÇÇ.eq_empty_or_nonempty
  ¬∑ rw [Finset.card_empty, Nat.cast_zero] at ht‚ÇÇ
    simpa [edgeDensity, (nonpos_of_mul_nonpos_right ht‚ÇÇ hŒ¥‚ÇÅ).antisymm (Nat.cast_nonneg _)] using hŒ¥'
  have hr : 2 * Œ¥ - Œ¥ ^ 2 = 1 - (1 - Œ¥) * (1 - Œ¥) := by ring
  rw [hr]
  norm_cast
  refine
    (Rat.cast_le.2 <| abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_one_sub_mul r hs ht hs‚ÇÇ' ht‚ÇÇ').trans ?_
  push_cast
  have h‚ÇÅ := hs‚ÇÇ'.mono hs
  have h‚ÇÇ := ht‚ÇÇ'.mono ht
  gcongr
  ¬∑ refine (le_div_iff‚ÇÄ ?_).2 hs‚ÇÇ
    exact mod_cast h‚ÇÅ.card_pos
  ¬∑ refine (le_div_iff‚ÇÄ ?_).2 ht‚ÇÇ
    exact mod_cast h‚ÇÇ.card_pos

name: Rel.abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_two_mul
initialProofState:
ùïú : Type u_1
Œ± : Type u_4
Œ≤ : Type u_5
inst‚úù¬π : LinearOrderedField ùïú
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ≤ ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : (a : Œ±) ‚Üí DecidablePred (r a)
s‚ÇÅ s‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ±
t‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÇ : Finset Œ≤
Œ¥ : ùïú
hs : HasSubset.Subset s‚ÇÇ s‚ÇÅ
ht : HasSubset.Subset t‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÅ
hŒ¥ : LE.le 0 Œ¥
hscard : LE.le (HMul.hMul (HSub.hSub 1 Œ¥) ‚Üës‚ÇÅ.card) ‚Üës‚ÇÇ.card
htcard : LE.le (HMul.hMul (HSub.hSub 1 Œ¥) ‚Üët‚ÇÅ.card) ‚Üët‚ÇÇ.card
‚ä¢ LE.le (abs (HSub.hSub ‚Üë(Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ) ‚Üë(Rel.edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ))) (HMul.hMul 2 Œ¥)
decl:
/-- If `s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ`, `t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ` and they take up all but a `Œ¥`-proportion, then the difference in edge
densities is at most `2 * Œ¥`. -/
theorem abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_two_mul (hs : s‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ s‚ÇÅ) (ht : t‚ÇÇ ‚äÜ t‚ÇÅ) (hŒ¥ : 0 ‚â§ Œ¥)
    (hscard : (1 - Œ¥) * #s‚ÇÅ ‚â§ #s‚ÇÇ) (htcard : (1 - Œ¥) * #t‚ÇÅ ‚â§ #t‚ÇÇ) :
    |(edgeDensity r s‚ÇÇ t‚ÇÇ : ùïú) - edgeDensity r s‚ÇÅ t‚ÇÅ| ‚â§ 2 * Œ¥ := by
  cases' lt_or_le Œ¥ 1 with h h
  ¬∑ exact (abs_edgeDensity_sub_edgeDensity_le_two_mul_sub_sq r hs ht hŒ¥ h hscard htcard).trans
      ((sub_le_self_iff _).2 <| sq_nonneg Œ¥)
  rw [two_mul]
  refine (abs_sub _ _).trans (add_le_add (le_trans ?_ h) (le_trans ?_ h)) <;>
    ¬∑ rw [abs_of_nonneg]
      ¬∑ exact mod_cast edgeDensity_le_one r _ _
      ¬∑ exact mod_cast edgeDensity_nonneg r _ _

name: Rel.swap_mem_interedges_iff
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ± ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : DecidableRel r
s t : Finset Œ±
hr : Symmetric r
x : Prod Œ± Œ±
‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (Rel.interedges r s t) x.swap) (Membership.mem (Rel.interedges r t s) x)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem swap_mem_interedges_iff (hr : Symmetric r) {x : Œ± √ó Œ±} :
    x.swap ‚àà interedges r s t ‚Üî x ‚àà interedges r t s := by
  rw [mem_interedges_iff, mem_interedges_iff, hr.iff]
  exact and_left_comm

name: Rel.mk_mem_interedges_comm
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4

inst‚úù : DecidableRel r
s t : Finset Œ±
a b : Œ±
hr : Symmetric r
‚ä¢ Iff (Membership.mem (Rel.interedges r s t) { fst := a, snd := b }) (Membership.mem (Rel.interedges r t s) { fst := b, snd := a })

name: Rel.card_interedges_comm
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ± ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : DecidableRel r
hr : Symmetric r
s t : Finset Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.interedges r s t).card (Rel.interedges r t s).card
decl:
theorem card_interedges_comm (hr : Symmetric r) (s t : Finset Œ±) :
    #(interedges r s t) = #(interedges r t s) :=
  Finset.card_bij (fun (x : Œ± √ó Œ±) _ ‚Ü¶ x.swap) (fun _ ‚Ü¶ (swap_mem_interedges_iff hr).2)
    (fun _ _ _ _ h ‚Ü¶ Prod.swap_injective h) fun x h ‚Ü¶
    ‚ü®x.swap, (swap_mem_interedges_iff hr).2 h, x.swap_swap‚ü©

name: Rel.edgeDensity_comm
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
r : Œ± ‚Üí Œ± ‚Üí Prop
inst‚úù : DecidableRel r
hr : Symmetric r
s t : Finset Œ±
‚ä¢ Eq (Rel.edgeDensity r s t) (Rel.edgeDensity r t s)
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_comm (hr : Symmetric r) (s t : Finset Œ±) :
    edgeDensity r s t = edgeDensity r t s := by
  rw [edgeDensity, mul_comm, card_interedges_comm hr, edgeDensity]

decl: lemma interedges_def (s t : Finset Œ±) : G.interedges s t = {e ‚àà s √óÀ¢ t | G.Adj e.1 e.2} := rfl

name: SimpleGraph.edgeDensity_def
initialProofState:

G : SimpleGraph Œ±
inst‚úù : DecidableRel G.Adj
s t : Finset Œ±

decl: lemma edgeDensity_def (s t : Finset Œ±) : G.edgeDensity s t = #(G.interedges s t) / (#s * #t) := rfl

decl:

    G.interedges (s.biUnion f) (t.biUnion g) =

name: SimpleGraph.card_interedges_add_card_interedges_compl
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
G : SimpleGraph Œ±
inst‚úù¬π : DecidableRel G.Adj
s t : Finset Œ±
inst‚úù : DecidableEq Œ±
h : Disjoint s t
‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (G.interedges s t).card ((HasCompl.compl G).interedges s t).card) (HMul.hMul s.card t.card)
decl:
theorem card_interedges_add_card_interedges_compl (h : Disjoint s t) :
    #(G.interedges s t) + #(G·∂ú.interedges s t) = #s * #t := by
  rw [‚Üê card_product, interedges_def, interedges_def]
  have : {e ‚àà s √óÀ¢ t | G·∂ú.Adj e.1 e.2} = {e ‚àà s √óÀ¢ t | ¬¨G.Adj e.1 e.2} := by
    refine filter_congr fun x hx ‚Ü¶ ?_
    rw [mem_product] at hx
    rw [compl_adj, and_iff_right (h.forall_ne_finset hx.1 hx.2)]
  rw [this, ‚Üê card_union_of_disjoint, filter_union_filter_neg_eq]
  exact disjoint_filter.2 fun _ _ ‚Ü¶ Classical.not_not.2

name: SimpleGraph.edgeDensity_add_edgeDensity_compl
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
G : SimpleGraph Œ±
inst‚úù¬π : DecidableRel G.Adj
s t : Finset Œ±
inst‚úù : DecidableEq Œ±

ht : t.Nonempty

‚ä¢ Eq (HAdd.hAdd (G.edgeDensity s t) ((HasCompl.compl G).edgeDensity s t)) 1
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_add_edgeDensity_compl (hs : s.Nonempty) (ht : t.Nonempty) (h : Disjoint s t) :
    G.edgeDensity s t + G·∂ú.edgeDensity s t = 1 := by
  rw [edgeDensity_def, edgeDensity_def, div_add_div_same, div_eq_one_iff_eq]
  ¬∑ exact mod_cast card_interedges_add_card_interedges_compl _ h
  ¬∑ positivity

name: SimpleGraph.edgeDensity_comm
initialProofState:
Œ± : Type u_4
G : SimpleGraph Œ±

‚ä¢ Eq (G.edgeDensity s t) (G.edgeDensity t s)
decl:
theorem edgeDensity_comm (s t : Finset Œ±) : G.edgeDensity s t = G.edgeDensity t s :=
  Rel.edgeDensity_comm G.symm s t
